attributes.action: Stop funding/promoting/perpetuating the Ukraine War with Russia.
attributes.additional_details:
Risk of world war / UK annihilation 
This is a pointless war
We are not in a position to be entering into a war with Russia - WE WILL LOSE. 
We do not have the strength within our Army
It is none of our business 
The UKs greed for resources or whatever the real reason for the war will cost people their lives and this country's future.
attributes.background:
Stop funding the Ukraine War
Stop perpetuating the volatile situation 
Stop offering opinions on the volatile situation
Promote a neutral position on the Ukraine Russia war
Promote dialogue with Russia and Ukraine
Promote a neutral NATO view

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632957
